name: Blasted Craters
description:
Take turns flying your ship and shooting down your enemies. You have a limited amount of fuel and only one shot each turn. In the tradition of Scorched Earth and Worms. A 4 player free for all.

W/Up to activate thruster

A/Left to turn left

D/Right to turn right

Space to shoot

This game was made for Trijam #52, Fun with Physics

I would have liked to add a player amount selection but ran out of time. There are also lots of ways the camera could be improved: panning to players to start their turns, tracking shots when the player is out of fuel, and there's a rotation bug that makes it spin too much.
